text_translated.428: “In recent days we captured alias' Richard 'and six more members of the 'Second Narcotalia', who are behind the criminal acts that have been presented in #Cali. They received instructions from 'Iván Márquez' from #Venezuela “: @DirectorPolicia in @lafm
text_translated.429: “There is organized crime behind all the criminal and vandalism actions that have been recorded in Colombia, which have nothing to do with public and peaceful demonstrations”: @DirectorPolicia speaks in @lafm
text_translated.430: Our @DirectorPolicia talks in @lafm about the police kidnapped yesterday between #Cali and #Palmira and the investigations behind the days of vandalism in recent weeks.
text_translated.431: “In front of the case of our fellow @DIJINPolicia police officers, held and assaulted last May 26 in Andalusia (#Valle), where the vehicle in which they were mobilizing was also incinerated, we already have identified those responsible. We are after them”: @DirectorPolicia
text_translated.432: “The authors would be liable for simple kidnapping, attempted homicide, torture, harm in the public good and personal injury. They are extremely serious crimes”: @DirectorPolicia in @NoticiasRCN.
text_translated.433: “I instructed General Fernando Murillo @DIJINPolicia to take up the investigation together with @FiscaliaCol in order to identify and identify those responsible for kidnapping and assaulting our policemen”: @DirectorPolicia in @NoticiasRCN.
text_translated.434: “Two of our colleagues were injured with a short puncture weapon and one more just left the hospital. We hope everyone will be able to recover as soon as possible”: @DirectorPolicia in @NoticiasRCN.
text_translated.435: “Our cops were on rest. They stopped arriving at Palmira in a supremely serious act. They were in recovery for the days of the last days and were attacked. They also incinerated the vehicle in which they were moving”: @DirectorPolicia in @NoticiasRCN.
text_translated.436: #AEstaHora our @DirectorPolicia speaks in @NoticiasRCN about the kidnapping, torture and multiple assaults that 8 of our cops suffered between #Cali and #Palmira. They recover from injuries.
text_translated.437: We accompany the quotidien of Colombiens in rural areas and urbaines, in garantissant leur securité and leur tranquillité. #ColombieUneRaison https://t.co/aNvg9DsW2x
